message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you consider that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I have to make a living, so I can only go up to $110. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $100?
